name: Enlightenment - Game Jam Edition
description:
Welcome to your Enlightenment

*Update* 17/05/2020 - Please use download the EnlightenmentFinal, this fixes all the major bugs since release. It fixes and adds:

  • AI behaviour of not losing the player when behind doors
  • Hearing functionality is fully implemented now
  • Monster can now enter doorways if left open
  • Prisoners can now be heard behind doors
  • Updated the super secret ending to make it more accessible! Still waiting to see it's glory in video form :)

- Original Post-

Enlightenment was made as part of the first person horror jam hosted by Tooth Games, inspired by Amnesia the Dark Descent.

Navigate the dark gloomy corridors of the dungeons and solve the puzzle to grant your enlightenment!

This game is the first game completely made and designed by myself, apologies in advance for any bugs / glitches.

All 3d assets created by myself as well, and the gameplay was all hobbled together by me in UE4 blueprints.

P.s. Can YOU find the super secret ending?
